title: In chemico methodology for engineered nanomaterial categorization according to number, nature and oxidative potential of reactive surface sites
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00810J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
V. Alcolea-Rodriguez, R. Portela, V. Calvino-Casilda, M. A. Bañares
Methanol probe chemisorption quantifies the number of reactive surface sites of engineered nanomaterials, enabling normalization per reactive site in reactivity and toxicity tests, rather than per mass or physical surface area.
